name: NORTH QUEENSLAND AERO CLUB
about: The North Queensland Aero Club (NQAC) is Far North Queensland's oldest and premier flight training school, scenic flight operator, and light aircraft charter company. With over 66 years of experience, NQAC has been a pivotal part of many aviators' journeys. Located at Mareeba Aerodrome on the picturesque Atherton Tablelands, the club offers one-on-one training for all licence levels, including Private Pilot Licence (PPL), Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), and advanced endorsements. Our fleet includes a variety of aircraft, such as Cessna 152s, 172s, and a Piper Cherokee 180. We provide comprehensive training, including cross-country flying in remote and controlled airspace, and support our graduates in finding their first jobs. Whether you aim to fly recreationally or commercially, NQAC's expert instructors and supportive staff are dedicated to helping you achieve your aviation goals.
services: ["Recreational Pilot License\nPrivate Pilot License\nCommercial Pilot License"]
